errorText: We were unable to modify your Master Password. Please try again later.
hintInfo: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
hintTitle: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
howItWorks: First, you need to create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
infoImage1: Store all your passwords, data or any information here. Forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
infoImage2: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
successText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas varius tortor nibh.
successTitle: Â¡Your Password Manager has been created!
whichData: For example, the number of your card, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.
